Grooveâ€™s Kitchen & Daiquiris
Where Flavor, Vibes, and Soulful Hospitality Meet
Nestled in the heart of Delray Beach,
Grooveâ€™s Kitchen & Daiquiris
isnâ€™t just a restaurantâ€”itâ€™s an experience. A fusion of
Southern comfort, soulful flavors, and electric energy
, Grooveâ€™s is your go-to destination for
brunch, dinner, craft cocktails, and unforgettable vibes
.
From our
legendary Gospel Brunch
to our
R&B Day Parties and Grown Folks Nights
, every visit is a celebration. Whether youâ€™re savoring our
buttermilk-fried catfish, creamy grits, or our signature daiquiris
, we bring
bold flavors and impeccable service
to every plate and every glass.
With a
sprawling 2,700 sq. ft. patio, an outdoor stage for live music, and a full bar serving up handcrafted cocktails
, Grooveâ€™s is where the city gathers to eat, drink, and vibe.
Come for the food. Stay for the groove.

Events
Weekly Specials & Signature Events at Grooveâ€™s Kitchen & Daiquiris Delray Beachâ€™s Go-To Spot for Flavor, Vibes, and Entertainment
At Grooveâ€™s, weâ€™re serving up more than just incredible food and cocktailsâ€”weâ€™re bringing the energy with
weekly specials and themed events
that turn every visit into an experience. Whether itâ€™s brunch with live music, an R&B day party, or a night filled with smooth cocktails and soulful vibes, weâ€™ve got something for everyone.
ğŸ¥‚ TUESDAY - FRIDAY | BRUNCH VIBES (9 AM - 3 PM)
Start your day with bold flavors & Southern comfort.
Join us for a laid-back brunch featuring
fluffy pancakes, creamy grits, fried catfish, and handcrafted mimosas
. Whether you're catching up with friends or handling business over brunch, this is where you want to be.
ğŸ½ï¸ WEDNESDAYS
ğŸ’ƒ THURSDAY & FRIDAY | LADIES NIGHT (5 PM - 8 PM)
Good vibes. Great drinks. Even better company.
Ladies, this oneâ€™s for you! Enjoy
free drinks at the bar
from
5 PM - 8 PM
, or sip complimentary cocktails at your table with a reservation and entreÌe purchase. The DJ is spinning, the drinks are flowing, and the night is yours!
ğŸ¶ SATURDAY AFTERNOON | BRUNCH & R&B DAY PARTY
Brunch. Cocktails. Classic R&B vibes.
Turn up your weekend with our
high-energy brunch experience
featuring
live DJs spinning classic & modern R&B hits
, bottomless mimosas, and our famous
Fried Lobster & Waffles
.
Come hungry, leave Groovy.
ğŸ•º SATURDAYNIGHT | GROWNFOLKSNIGHT
Itâ€™s your time to unwind & let loose.
Saturday night is all about
grown & sexy energy
â€”smooth cocktails, soulful music, and a crowd that knows how to vibe. Whether youâ€™re here for the ambiance or the signature drinks,
expect good company, great music, and an unforgettable night
.
ğŸ¤ SUNDAY MORNING | GOSPEL BRUNCH (9 AM - 3 PM)
Food for the soulâ€”both on your plate and in the music.
Experience
Gospel Brunch
like never before with
live gospel performances, uplifting vibes, and a brunch menu packed with Southern classics
like
Catfish & Grits, Smothered Pork Chops, and Peach Cobbler Pancakes
.
ğŸŒ… SUNDAY EVENING | SOUL SUNDAY (LIVE BANDS & KARAOKE)
A perfect way to close out the weekend.
Enjoy the sounds of
live bands, soulful karaoke, and specialty cocktails
in a relaxed, open-air setting. Whether youâ€™re here for dinner or just to vibe,
Sunset Soul is the ultimate Sunday wind-down
.
